title: Phone app T9 dialer not showing all contacts
content:
Hello All,
I recently purchased a Google Pixel 4a and everything was working fine.
Suddenly since yesterday my Phone app does not show all the contacts when I dial using the T9 dialer.
I have multiple contacts with similar names, so if I searched "Store" it used to display all contacts with "Store" name but now it shows only 1 contact. So I have to type the full name to go to that particular contact.
E.g I have 2 contacts "Store VCL 313" & "Store VCL 2".
When I type "Store" it only shows "Store VCL 2" but just a day before it used to show all the contacts that had "Store" in the name.

Please help it is very annoying.
